close_reason:
Implemented comprehensive forum topic handling in get_messages().

**Decision: Analyze ALL topics in forums**

**Implementation:**
- Added _get_forum_topics() function to fetch all topic IDs from a forum using GetForumTopicsRequest
- Updated get_messages() to detect forum chats by checking entity.megagroup and entity.forum
- When forum is detected, fetches messages from each topic using iter_messages(reply_to=topic_id)
- Aggregates and deduplicates messages across all topics
- Falls back to default behavior if no topics found or error occurs

**Impact on statistics:**
- Forums now provide complete data across all topics (not just General)
- Statistics are accurate and representative of entire forum activity
- More API calls per forum, but ensures data completeness

**Testing:**
- Added 3 new tests for forum message fetching scenarios
- All 71 telegram client tests pass

**Files changed:**
- src/chatfilter/telegram/client.py: Added forum topic support
- tests/test_telegram_client.py: Added forum tests and updated existing tests

**Sources:**
- Telethon issue #3837: https://github.com/LonamiWebs/Telethon/issues/3837
- GetForumTopicsRequest API: https://tl.telethon.dev/methods/channels/get_forum_topics.html
